words.source: H3212 Qal imv. 2ms of הָלַךְ 'to go, walk'; KJV 'get thee', ESV 'go', NASB 'go'
H413 prep. 'to, toward'; all trans. agree
H6547 proper name; all trans. agree
H1242 prep. b- + art. + n.ms בֹּקֶר 'morning'; KJV 'in the morning', ESV 'in the morning', NASB 'in the morning'
H2009 interj. הִנֵּה 'behold, look'; KJV 'lo', ESV 'behold', NASB 'behold'
H3318 Qal ptc. ms of יָצָא 'to go out'; KJV 'he goeth out', ESV 'he is going out', NASB 'he is going out'
H4325 art. + n.mp מַיִם 'water' + dir. he; KJV 'unto the water', ESV 'to the water', NASB 'to the water'
H5324 conj. + Niphal perf. 2ms of נָצַב 'to stand, take one's stand'; KJV 'and thou shalt stand', ESV 'and wait', NASB 'and station yourself'
H7125 prep. l- + Qal inf. constr. + 3ms suff. of קָרָא 'to meet'; KJV 'to meet him', ESV 'to meet him', NASB 'to meet him'
H5921 prep. עַל 'upon, on, by'; KJV 'by', ESV 'on', NASB 'on'
H8193 n.fs constr. שָׂפָה 'lip, bank, edge'; KJV 'the brink of', ESV 'the bank of', NASB 'the bank of'
H2975 art. + n.ms יְאֹר 'Nile, river'; KJV 'the river', ESV 'the Nile', NASB 'the Nile'
H4294 conj. + art. + n.ms מַטֶּה 'staff, rod'; KJV 'and the rod', ESV 'and the staff', NASB 'and the staff'
H834 rel. pron. אֲשֶׁר 'who, which, that'; KJV 'which', ESV 'that', NASB 'that'
H2015 Niphal perf. 3ms of הָפַךְ 'to turn, overturn'; KJV 'was turned to', ESV 'was turned into', NASB 'was turned into'
H5175 prep. l- + n.ms נָחָשׁ 'serpent, snake'; KJV 'to a serpent', ESV 'a serpent', NASB 'a serpent'
H3947 Qal impf. 2ms of לָקַח 'to take'; KJV 'shalt thou take', ESV 'you shall take', NASB 'you shall take'
H3027 prep. b- + n.fs constr. + 2ms suff. יָד 'hand'; KJV 'in thine hand', ESV 'in your hand', NASB 'in your hand'
